tool_description: Analyzes how word meanings have changed over time by comparing historical definitions and usage contexts across different periods.

language.description: Language of the word being analyzed

historical_periods.description: List of historical periods to analyze

change_types.description: Types of semantic change to focus on: broadening, narrowing, amelioration, pejoration, metaphor, metonymy

error_messages: Insufficient historical periods: Provide at least 2 historical periods for meaningful comparison.
Unsupported change type: Use valid semantic change types: broadening, narrowing, amelioration, pejoration, metaphor, metonymy.
No semantic data available: The word lacks sufficient historical semantic data for the specified periods.
Language not supported: The specified language lacks adequate historical semantic resources.
usage: Specify the target word, language, and historical periods for analysis. Optionally focus on specific types of semantic change. Returns detailed analysis of meaning evolution.

semantic_changes.description: List of identified semantic changes with descriptions

primary_meanings.description: Core meanings for each historical period

change_classification.description: Overall classification of semantic evolution pattern
